short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can simplify your work as partners by using this extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can improve Azure Portal UX by using this Chrome extension. It will be possible to avoid to miss put your MPN IDs into your subscriptions by using this feature!
- Enable confirm MPN IDs with subscription IDs as list

** Please note this isn't Microsoft official extention **
